00023 #define FOREACH_SERIE(index, dataset) \
00024         for (int index = 0; index < dataset->GetSerieCount(); index++)
00025 
00026 #define FOREACH_DATAITEM(index, serie, dataset) \
00027         for (int index = 0; index < dataset->GetCount(serie); index++)

00033 class WXDLLEXPORT DatasetObserver
00034 {
00035 public:
00036         DatasetObserver();
00037         virtual ~DatasetObserver();
00038 
00039         virtual void DatasetChanged(Dataset *dataset) = 0;
00040 };

00046 class WXDLLEXPORT Dataset : public wxObject,
00047         public RefObject, public Observable<DatasetObserver>, public DrawObserver
00048 {
00049         DECLARE_CLASS(Dataset)
00050 public:
00051         Dataset();
00052         virtual ~Dataset();
00053 
00058         void SetRenderer(Renderer *renderer);
00059 
00060         Renderer *GetBaseRenderer();
00061 
00062         void BeginUpdate();
00063 
00064         void EndUpdate();
00065 
00070         virtual int GetSerieCount() = 0;
00071 
00077         virtual int GetCount(int serie) = 0;
00078 
00084         virtual wxString GetSerieName(int serie) = 0;
00085 
00086         virtual double GetMinValue(bool vertical) = 0;
00087 
00088         virtual double GetMaxValue(bool vertical) = 0;
00089 
00090         //
00091         // DrawObjectObserver
00092         //
00093         // Received from renderer
00094         virtual void NeedRedraw(DrawObject *obj);
00095 
00096 protected:
00101         virtual bool AcceptRenderer(Renderer *r) = 0;
00102 
00103         void DatasetChanged();
00104 
00105         Renderer *m_renderer;
00106         bool m_updating;
00107         bool m_changed;
00108 
00109 private:
00110         FIRE_WITH_THIS(DatasetChanged);
00111 };
